plot_points: Andrew arrives at his childhood home and senses something is off.
His mom and Grandpa Jim mention his birthday, encouraging celebration.
His mother reveals a suspicious lump in her breast and awaits test results.
Andrew comforts his mother but battles his own fear and helplessness.
Andrew receives a text from Natalie about her fight with Chris on their anniversary.
Andrew faces emotional overload, torn between family and Natalie’s crisis.

main.name: Andrew Nolan
main.focus: His emotional vulnerability confronting his mother's illness and Natalie's turmoil.

supporting.name: Jill Nolan
supporting.focus: Reveals her fear after finding a lump, showing new vulnerability.

supporting.name: Jim Nolan
supporting.focus: Provides light humor but remains emotionally supportive in the background.

supporting.name: Natalie Reynolds
supporting.focus: Shares her own relationship conflict, adding to Andrew’s emotional burden.

themes_conflicts.description: Andrew’s newfound terror at possibly losing his mother.
The crushing weight of supporting everyone while handling his own pain.
Tension created by Andrew’s inability to voice his deepest fears and desires.
Seeking solace in childhood home, only to find comfort has vanished.
